title: Fragile X (Martin Bell) syndrome and dental care.
summary: A case is presented, and the literature reviewed, of a child with fragile X syndrome. Dental features associated with this prevalent syndrome are outlined, as are the implications for dentistry of the other clinical features of cardiac anomalies and joint hyp â€¦
abstract: A case is presented, and the literature reviewed, of a child with fragile X syndrome. Dental features associated with this prevalent syndrome are outlined, as are the implications for dentistry of the other clinical features of cardiac anomalies and joint hyperextensibility.
